org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Admin

  • 使用Admin的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.impl  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client
    Provides HBase Client Table of Contents Overview Example API Usage Overview To administer HBase, create and drop tables, list and alter tables, use Admin.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.replication  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce
    Provides HBase MapReduce Input/OutputFormats, a table indexing MapReduce job, and utility methods.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest
    HBase REST This package provides a RESTful Web service front end for HBase.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.model  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.thrift
    Provides an HBase Thrift service.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tool  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.tool.coprocessor  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util  
    org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.client
    This package provides fully-functional exemplar Java code demonstrating simple usage of the hbase-client API, for incorporation into a Maven archetype with hbase-client dependency.
    org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.shaded_client
    This package provides fully-functional exemplar Java code demonstrating simple usage of the hbase-client API, for incorporation into a Maven archetype with hbase-shaded-client dependency.

      返回Admin的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Admin ConnectionCache.getAdmin()
      Caller doesn't close the admin afterwards.
      参数类型为Admin的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void HBaseFsckRepair.fixUnassigned(Admin admin, RegionInfo region)
      Fix unassigned by creating/transition the unassigned ZK node for this region to OFFLINE state with a special flag to tell the master that this is a forced operation by HBCK.
      private static void HBaseFsckRepair.forceOfflineInZK(Admin admin, RegionInfo region)
      In 0.90, this forces an HRI offline by setting the RegionTransitionData in ZK to have HBCK_CODE_NAME as the server.
      private String RegionMover.getServerNameForRegion(Admin admin, RegionInfo region)
      Get servername that is up in hbase:meta hosting the given region. this is hostname + port + startcode comma-delimited.
      private ArrayList<String> RegionMover.getServers(Admin admin)
      Get Arraylist of Servers in the cluster
      private boolean RegionMover.isSameServer(Admin admin, RegionInfo region, String serverName)
      Returns true if passed region is still on serverName when we look at hbase:meta.
      private void RegionMover.isSuccessfulScan(Admin admin, RegionInfo region)
      Tries to scan a row from passed region
      private void RegionMover.loadRegions(Admin admin, String hostname, int port, List<RegionInfo> regionsToMove, boolean ack) 
      private void RegionMover.stripMaster(ArrayList<String> regionServers, Admin admin)
      Exclude master from list of RSs to move regions to
      private void RegionMover.unloadRegions(Admin admin, String server, ArrayList<String> regionServers, boolean ack, List<RegionInfo> movedRegions) 
      static void HBaseFsckRepair.waitUntilAssigned(Admin admin, RegionInfo region) 
      参数类型为Admin的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中的构造器

    • org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.client中Admin的使用

      参数类型为Admin的org.apache.hbase.archetypes.exemplars.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) static void HelloHBase.createNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#createNamespace and Admin#createTable to create a namespace with a table that has one column-family.
      (专用程序包) static void HelloHBase.deleteNamespaceAndTable(Admin admin)
      Invokes Admin#disableTable, Admin#deleteTable, and Admin#deleteNamespace to disable/delete Table and delete Namespace.
      (专用程序包) static boolean HelloHBase.namespaceExists(Admin admin, String namespaceName)
      Checks to see whether a namespace exists.
